medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain for 24 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started in the RLQ and gradually progressed over the course of the day and night. The patient awoke on the day of presentation with increased tenderness in the RLQ, leading to presentation in the emergency department. No fevers or nausea/vomiting reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Reflux (takes some medication for stomach pain).
